types.description: Provides timestamp packets with current time

in_ports.description: Triggers emission of packet with current time.
in_ports.name: TRIGGER

types.name: timestamp/time

types.description: Make timestamp packets with time provided on ports (year, month, day, hour, minute, seconds).

in_ports.description: Receive year of the timestamp counting from year 0, but can't be less than 1970.
in_ports.name: YEAR

in_ports.description: Receive day of the timestamp in the range 1 to 31.
in_ports.name: MONTH_DAY

in_ports.description: Receive nano second of the timestamp (0-999999999).
in_ports.name: NANO_SECOND

types.name: timestamp/make-time

out_ports.description: Packet with time converted from broken-down time provided via ports. First packet is sent only after values are received in all ports.
out_ports.name: OUT

types.description: Split timestamp packets into broken-down time (year, month, day, hour, minute, seconds).

in_ports.description: Packet with time to be converted into broken-down time.
in_ports.name: IN

types.name: timestamp/split-time

out_ports.description: Month of the timestamp in the range 1 to 12.
out_ports.name: MONTH

out_ports.description: The day of the month in timestamp. Range 1 to 31.
out_ports.name: MONTH_DAY

out_ports.description: Hour of the timestamp from 0 to 23.
out_ports.name: HOUR

out_ports.description: Minute of the timestamp in the range 0 to 59.
out_ports.name: MINUTE

out_ports.description: Second of the timestamp, from 0 to 59. Eventually it can be up to 60 to allow for leap seconds.
out_ports.name: SECOND

out_ports.description: Nano second of the timestamp, from 0 to 999999999.
out_ports.name: NANO_SECOND

out_ports.description: Day of the week starting on Sunday, in the range 0 to 6. So Sunday is 0, Monday is 1, ....
out_ports.name: WEEK_DAY

out_ports.description: The number of days since January 1, in the range 0 to 365.
out_ports.name: YEAR_DAY

out_ports.description: Indicates whether daylight saving time is in effect at the time converted. TRUE if daylight saving is in effect or FALSE if it is not. This packet may not be sent if information is not available.
out_ports.name: DAYLIGHT_SAVING_TIME
